gov.usgs.anss.db

Class RSFields

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.usgs.anss.db.RSFields

  • public final class RSFields
extends java.lang.Object
    This contains the information about the fields in a resultSet. Basically the metadata for the dictionary. This includes the information on column width, precision of floating values, scale, column #, field name, field type.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RSFields(int columnin, java.sql.ResultSetMetaData md)
      Creates new RSFields with information about one column of a ResultSetMetaData

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString(java.sql.ResultSet rs)
        Convert the column represented by this RSFields to a string given a result set where this column resides. It will output the data based on the width and precision information in the dictionary
        Parameters:
        rs - The result set we which to decode this column from
        Returns:
        A string representation of this column in the input ResultSet
